title: ICE: 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 1' with Cdebuginfo=2

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code code from official tests: `./src/test/ui/mir/ssa-analysis-regression-50041.rs` ```Rust // build-pass // compile-flags: -Z mir-opt-level=4 #![crate_type = "lib"] #![feature(lang_items)] #![no_std] struct NonNull(*const T); struct Unique(NonNull); #[lang = "owned_box"] pub struct Box(Unique); impl Drop for Box { fn drop(&mut self) {} } #[lang = "box_free"] #[inline(always)] unsafe fn box_free(ptr: Unique) { dealloc(ptr.0.0) } #[inline(never)] fn dealloc(_: *const T) {} pub struct Foo(T); pub fn foo(a: Option>>) -> usize { let f = match a { None => Foo(0), Some(vec) => *vec, }; f.0 } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (234151769 2022-12-03) binary: rustc commit-hash: 23415176968e81e0aac92d0218612a89c4e68a82 commit-date: 2022-12-03 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output ` rustc ./src/test/ui/mir/ssa-analysis-regression-50041.rs -Cdebuginfo=2` ``` ```
